pages.text: The $(d)Ender Mailbox$() allows you to send and receive $(l:items/ender_letter)Ender Letters$(/l) to and from other players.$(br2)To send a Letter, simply use it on the Mailbox and it will be sent to the recipient.
pages.title: Ender Mailbox

pages.text: Using any Mailbox will show your incoming Letters, in the same way that Ender Chests show your items.
